name: Planning_Team_Workflow_UI
purpose: Build comprehensive planning workflow system with Telos UI for idea capture and proposal management
description: Create a complete planning workflow system starting with Telos UI for managing proposals, enabling the Planning Team CIs to collaborate on turning ideas into executable Development Sprints. This includes dashboard views, proposal cards, and integration with the workflow pipeline.
